title: Exposed
description:
"I could lock her in this room, handcuff her to the bed. She'd be mine forever."Weston Wraith has it all. 
Sex on demand. Endless cashflow. A palace to call his home.
Yet, he's under his ruthless father's command, a spectator to his father's merciless abuse of his sister, 
Kamila Ruby Wraith.
As everything in Weston's life spirals out of control, twisted truths about the past come to the surface.Mandy Rawlins is sent to the Wraiths as a means of punishment. Soon, the reluctant visitor becomes the object of Weston Wraith's... desire. There is an overlying dark theme to this book. Proceed with caution.
author: Arabella Black
